name: Super Robot Taisen T: Bonus Scenario Full Pack
summary:
Bundle with all extra scenarios, which includes:
・ Armor Fight, Ready, Go!
・ Vengeful Space
・ Today is Bonus Day!
・ Dynamic Reunion
・ Pitch Black Stress
・ Showdown! Cowboy vs CEO!
・ Magic Knights and Battlers
・ Paradise Gourmet Travelogue
・ Where the Heart lies
・ This is Paradise
・ A Fairy Eventful Afternoon
・ Decade-Long Trio
・ Wandering Strangers
・ Troubled Rivals
・ Curse of the Superdeformed
・ Who is the Protagonist?
・ A Comet's Trajectory
・ To the Future, Together
・ Beautiful Criminals
・ Special Section 3's Presentation
